purpose: The email announces the call for papers (CFP) for the 12th International Conference on Software Defined Systems (SDS2025), which will take place in Lyon, France from December 2-5, 2025. It invites researchers, engineers, and practitioners to submit high-quality research and case studies on various topics related to software-defined systems. The email provides important details such as submission deadlines, conference themes, and guidelines for manuscript preparation. The conference aims to foster interdisciplinary dialogue and showcase innovations in software-defined technologies.

infos:
Subject: CFP: (IEEE Tech Sponsored) SDS2025: Lyon, France 2-5 Dec 2025 - The 12th International Conference on Software Defined Systems
From: SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>

Content-Type:text/plain

from hardware to software, SDS 2025 aims to stimulate cross-disciplinary
Join us at SDS 2025 and help shape a future where every system, service,
papers will appear in the SDS 2025 Proceeding and to be submitted to IEEE
